definition: dried meat/private teacher's remuneration/withered/variant of 修[xiu1]
to decorate/to embellish/to repair/to build/to write/to cultivate/to study/to take (a class)
to repair/to patch/to mend/to make up for/to fill (a vacancy)/to supplement

sentences.english: Can web vulnerability scanners help you remediate the vulnerability?
sentences.chinese: Web漏洞扫描器能帮助我们修补漏洞吗？

sentences.english: For patch updates and to play a fast demo, see below.
sentences.chinese: 修补更新和发挥快速演示，见下文。

sentences.english: Filling is stuffing and fixing with slurry mixture of raw lacquer and fine gray gypsum.
sentences.chinese: 补灰就是用生漆和细石膏调和成浆状举办填密和修补。

sentences.english: SJL daub can be used to repair cement or concrete products for their outlook defects.
sentences.chinese: SJL胶泥可用于修补混凝土与水泥制品的外观缺陷。

sentences.english: Objective To investigate the feasibility of wrapping a lacerated kidney with pedicled omental graft.
sentences.chinese: 目的观察肾脏裂伤后大网膜包肾修补方法的疗效。

sentences.english: You can use it repair a leaky toilet, or to fix a crack on a toilet seat.
sentences.chinese: 可以用它修补漏水的马桶，修理马桶座圈的裂缝。

sentences.english: I would not hold this up as comparable to surgical mitral valve repair.
sentences.chinese: 我不会认为它的效果与二尖瓣外科修补相当。

sentences.english: We must fight the urge to revamp our diplomatic relations.
sentences.chinese: 我们必须极力修补我们的外交关系。

sentences.english: Various properties Of F type rapid road patching material is studied in this paper.
sentences.chinese: 本文研究了F型道路快速修补材料的各项性能。

sentences.english: Technology and materials used to repair wooden furniture and cabinets.
sentences.chinese: 技术和材料用于修补木制家具和橱柜。

sentences.english: Form later repair a phenomenon, occurrence nerve is colloid the cell is proliferous .
sentences.chinese: 以后形成修补现象，出现神经胶质细胞增生。

sentences.english: The mends on your shirt were almost invisible.
sentences.chinese: 你衬衣上修补的地方简直看不出来。

sentences.english: Hackers have already attacked several European Web sites using the unpatched exploit.
sentences.chinese: 该漏洞尚为被修补，黑客已乘机攻击了数个欧洲网站。

sentences.english: Spirit should be the temple, wisdom to release the monks side by hand touching the edge repair figure of Buddha.
sentences.chinese: 灵应寺内，智释和尚正在边用手触摸边修补佛像。

sentences.english: Objective To study the value of ultrasound in incisional hernia before and after its operation.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨超声对切口疝修补手术前后检查的应用价值。

sentences.english: Brush or roller for small areas and touch-up only.
sentences.chinese: 小面积施工或修补时可采用刷涂或辊涂。

definition: to restore/to renovate/restoration/(computing) to fix (a bug)
to repair/to fix/to prune/to trim/(coll.) to sort sb out/to fix sb
to spruce up/to renovate/to tend (a garden)/to groom (one's hair)/to finish (a rough surface)/to trim (a lawn)/to touch up (a photo)
to restore (sth) to (its) former condition/to recover from illness/recovery
to cause damage to/to ruin/to destroy
to repair (sth broken)/to restore (sth damaged)/to establish friendly relations with/(literary) to do meritorious deeds
